channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: Hi one hi all, I need help. I'm creating forums, but how do I actually MAKE the forum?Please help prefferably someone whos done it (moparisthebest,bigmac etc..) thanks. :)

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:13, topic:20284”][quote author=irfan786 link=topic=30813.msg357641#msg357641 date=1162005390]

stop posting or i will shoot the hell out of u!!!1

Lol, tell me your IP now, and I wont totally destroy your computer, where as if I get a mod/admin to get your IP…You don’t want to know what I will do… Seriously you don’t come to a RS cheating/hacking community and tell us all off. We know how to hack and some of us know how to crack, we will fucking kill your internet life.

Lol and is it just me or does this guy post like a 11/12 year old?
[/quote]

So you can hack someones computer… but you cant make a forum? … suuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuure…[/quote]

Lol sdfu please, I just wanted to scare him ;). [br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 05:23:06 PM[/size][hr][quote=“james, post:15, topic:20284”][quote author=irfan786 link=topic=30813.msg357641#msg357641 date=1162005390]

stop posting or i will shoot the hell out of u!!!1

Lol, tell me your IP now, and I wont totally destroy your computer, where as if I get a mod/admin to get your IP…You don’t want to know what I will do… Seriously you don’t come to a RS cheating/hacking community and tell us all off. We know how to hack and some of us know how to crack, we will fucking kill your internet life.

Lol and is it just me or does this guy post like a 11/12 year old?
[/quote]

your retarded[/quote]

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Hi everyone :), Im having the same problem lol. I need a good forum but don’t know how to make one. I need a simple url ending, preferrably .com or .co.nr or something like that. Any help would be greatly appreciated, Thanks =)!

Read full topic
